usethirdpartycookie.name: ./usethirdpartycookie
usethirdpartycookie.text: 'Use 'OneTrust' Cookies (leave unchecked to use custom cookie implementation)

siteregion.fieldLabel: Site Region (i.e. the English region name)
siteregion.name: ./siteregion

sitelanguage.fieldLabel: Site Language (i.e. the Language code to appear in the menu)
sitelanguage.name: ./sitelanguage

acceptlanguages.fieldLabel: Accepts Language (i.e. comma separate the ISO language code(s) targetted by this site)
acceptlanguages.name: ./acceptlanguages

direction.fieldDescription: direction property sets the direction of an HTML element‘s text. This is useful for languages that use right-to-left scripts like Adlam, Arabic, Dhivehi, Hebrew, Mandinka, N’Ko, Pashto, Persian, Pular, Sindhi, Syriac, Thaana, Urdu, Yiddish, etc.
direction.name: ./direction

auto.text: Auto. (only recommended if the text direction is unknown).

shipnowmarketo.name: ./shipnowmarketo
shipnowmarketo.text: 'Ship Now'/'Open account' forms submit to Marketo

buttonName.fieldDescription: This 'Open a business account' button will be displayed on the right side of the Header Navigation bar in the Desktop layout
buttonName.name: ./header-buttonName

buttonLink.fieldDescription: The 'Open a business account' button should lead to a page with a form to create a new business account
buttonLink.name: ./header-buttonLink

signInLabel.fieldDescription: This 'Sign In' label will be displayed in the Hamburger Navigation Menu of the header in the Tablet and Mobile layout
signInLabel.name: ./header-signInLabel

categoryLinksLabel.fieldDescription: This 'Categories' label will be displayed in the Hamburger Navigation Menu of the header in the Tablet and Mobile layout
categoryLinksLabel.name: ./header-categoryLinksLabel

homePageLabel.fieldDescription: This 'Home' label will be displayed on the first place on the left side of the of the Header Navigation bar in the Desktop layout
homePageLabel.name: ./header-homePageLabel

moreLinkLabel.fieldDescription: By default, we show only one row with Categories on the Navigation bar in the Desktop layout. If there is not enough space for all Categories in that row, this 'More' link is added, that allows you to see all Categories in multiple rows
moreLinkLabel.name: ./header-moreLinkLabel

lessLinkLabel.fieldDescription: By default, we show only one row with Categories on the Navigation bar in the Desktop layout. If there is not enough space for all Categories in that row, a 'More' link is added, that allows you to see all Categories in multiple rows. To return to a one-row view of the Navigation bar, you need to use this 'Less' link
lessLinkLabel.name: ./header-lessLinkLabel

companyLinksLabel.fieldDescription: This 'Company' label will be displayed in the Hamburger Navigation Menu of the header in the Tablet and Mobile layout
companyLinksLabel.name: ./header-companyLinksLabel

companyLinksList.fieldDescription: Add links like 'About Us', 'Contact Us'. Synchronisation with Blueprint (Master) disabled (inheritance cancelled)

showThumbnail.fieldDescription: If checked, the thumbnail will be shown in search bar results.

linkTarget.fieldDescription: If checked the link will be opened in a new browser tab.

promo-text.emptyText: Get tips and advice on delivering exceptional logistics service and expanding your business to global audience.

companyLinksLabel.fieldDescription: This 'Company' label will be displayed above the list of all links connected to the company

socialNetwork.fieldDescription: Add icons for the list of social networks to be displayed on the left side

title.fieldLabel: Article Author Banner Title (for Desktop only)

title.fieldLabel: Title (will be used if the component does not have a custom title configuration)
title.fieldDescription: This field allows you to define a default title for related posts. This default title will be used when the component doesn't have a custom title configured. If you don't set a default title and there's no custom title configuration, no title will be displayed for the related posts.
title.name: ./relatedPosts-title

disable.fieldDescription: If checked the banner won't be shown.
disable.name: ./ctaBanner-article-bottom-disabled

title.emptyText: Subscribe To Our Newsletter And Be The First To Receive Exclusive Updates, Exciting Offers, And Insider Insights
title.value: Subscribe To Our Newsletter And Be The First To Receive Exclusive Updates, Exciting Offers, And Insider Insights
